trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kendallville
There were no other sightings in Kendallville on or around June 26th 2010
Summary: 3 round shaped objects in a row then broke flight pattern and separated.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were headed west bound from kendaville indiana on us 6 at 10:00 pm on june 26 2010.i had just looked at the time on the radio. when we were 2 mile east of state rd 9 north i noticed 3 lights travling east on the south side of us 6 in a row aproxamently 100 to 200 yards apart.i would say flying at a height of what the samartin helocopters fly in our state.i pointed them out to my wife my reaction was *(words deleted--sgonzalez\cms)! i slowed the car.they made a slight arch in there movment or a s flight movment as they proceded we talked as we watched when we reached the point where they were straight south of us the last object in the row made a 90 degree right angle and sped south at a high rated of speed out of sight.the second object then made a 45 degree right hand turn leaving the formation at a slower rate of speed yet much faster than i have ever seen any aircraft fly.we could see it at a great distance the first object continued eastward and we lost sight as we traveled westward.the light that they cased was a bright white,no blinking or shimmering.the sun at that time was over the horizon and our head lights had come on.i have seen pictures of orbs and this i belive were not of that.in 1990 i witnessed a simular sighting of one of the same some 8 miles away.nothing of this world that i have seen can make a 90 degree turn and travel at the speed i have seen these objects travel.my wife has never been a beliver this sighting scared her to the point of shaking and now agrees what we seen could not of been of our world.there was alot of trafic east and west bound that night im sure that we were not the only one that could have seen the 3 brightly lit objects hopefully some one else will come forward.when we got home i posted it on my face page and i recived a hit on it from a friend who lives in kendaville.she and her husband watched a single light.
